item.title: Improving Database Reliability with MCIV and eBPF
item.description: Listen to the interview with our engineer: Introduction Welcome back to the ShitOps Engineering Blog! Today, we are going to tackle a significant problem that many tech companies face: database reliability. As we all know, databases are the backbone of any modern application, but they can sometimes be a source of frustration due to their occasional instability. In this blog post, we will present an innovative solution using Multi-Cluster In-Vertex (MCIV) technology combined with extended Berkeley Packet Filter (eBPF) to ensure a robust and reliable database infrastructure.
